Articles.Content:
I got 3 free month premium+ subscription for buying Samsung S3 LTE (Contract with Orange)

I not decided did a prolong my subscription but 20 pln/per month is not so expansive given fact that i member Polish lower-lower class

But i love i music

I noticed that when i write scientific text my MA Thesis i do it better, i wonder does any correlation between listening music and creative work?

EDIT: BTW can someone recommend my good music to listening while writing MA thesis, like The Scientist from Coldplay but i willl not listen it whole day

Edited December 9, 2014 by Pawelk198604
